subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*zə}}; cognate with Proto-Kukish {{IPAfont|*/ca/}}, {{cog|mro|caŋ||to do, to make}},  & {{cog|bo|tr=mdzad.pa}}, {{m|bo|tr=mdzod}}, from underlying {{IPAfont|*/m-za-t/}} "to do, to act", possibly also related to {{m|bo|tr=bzo|t=work, labour}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).̈Schuessler ddisputes {{zh-ref|Löffler (1966)}}'s proposed connection to {{och-l|乍|to do, work, make}} due to phonological difficulties.

{{zh-ref|Unger (1984)}} posits a possible relationship with {{cog|bo|tr=rdzi.po||t=herdsman}}
